content.question: Calculate the minimum number of nucleotides required in the coding region of the LDS2B mRNA molecule to produce and terminate the 565-amino acid polypeptide. Provide TWO reasons that the number of nucleotides in the mature mRNA may differ from the number of base pairs in the gene.
